Project Target

The purpose is to create an platform that user could login and communicate with each other, in the meantime, it provide a group of api, which allow developers to create online games and publish to platform, any users would join and play game on platform.

Sounds like SNS. However, this project should allowing more interactive action. It's based on .net(Silverlight, WCF, Azure, etc.).

Feature Requirement

The basic infostructure provided by platform
  • User authentication module
  • GameRoom module
  • Game Excute module
  • Platform Client(Silverlight)

The core feature is a set of Api for creating interactive application
  • Identity resource manage api
  • instruction send/receive api
